user_query: I'm organizing a company event and need to send out SMS notifications to all the attendees. Can you provide me with the current regional settings of my SMSAPI.com profile and check the status of phone numbers to ensure they are active?

TaskList.description: Retrieve the current regional settings of the SMSAPI.com profile.
Check the status of phone numbers to ensure they are active for sending notifications.
Send out SMS notifications to all the attendees once the regional settings and phone status are confirmed.
